notifications.title: We're Open Source
notifications.message:
Here is a little known fact (until you see this message) - Windscribe Windows/Mac/Linux apps are open source. Click the link below to see the Github repository. You can build your own custom version of Windscribe, add a feature, or fix a bug if you spot one. Our browser extensions are open source too by the way.

View Source Code

notifications.title: Bored? There is a solution
notifications.message:
COVID sucks. Your favorite places are closed, and you are probably bored out of your mind. There is a solution - Windscribe. We unblock over 220 streaming services in most countries. Connect to a Windscribe location and stream. It's as simple as that. Found a service that doesn't work? Let us know and we will unblock it for you.

Make a Suggestion

notifications.title: Happy Holidays!
notifications.message:
The holiday season is upon us, and given the world situation, it is not going to be a fun one. To brighten up your day, just slightly, we have made a short film. Click the link below to see it. Happy holidays from Windscribe!

Watch Our Film
